results.title: Pre School Child
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Joining in (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Pre School Child”.
Development from simple to more complicated forms of social play is gradual, and this film identifies six different stages. Also points out different ways in which adults may encourage and take part in children’s play.

results.title: Where I came from and where I am going!
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Michelle Tobin
results.brief_description: Michelle’s girls have motivated her and given her the strength to know herself. Michelle is a Yorta Yorta woman who has HIV, who loves her land and loves her girls.

results.title: A Short story about love
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Karen Wootton
results.brief_description: Karen is young, travelling and in love. When she returns from her travels she discovers she has HIV and with this diagnosis her life changes. Karen must come to terms with life’s new circumstances as she laments the fact that she may never have another relationship or be a mother. But life does move on for Karen and with the help of friends and family, Karen finds love again.
results.description: Karen is young, travelling and in love. When she returns from her travels she discovers she has HIV and with this diagnosis her life changes. Karen must come to terms with life’s new circumstances as she laments the fact that she may never have another relationship or be a mother. But life does move on for Karen and with the help of friends and family, Karen finds love again.
description_for_label: Karen is young, travelling and in love. When she returns from her travels she discovers she has HIV and with this diagnosis her life changes. Karen must come to terms with life’s new circumstances as she laments the fact that she may never have another relationship or be a mother. But life does move on for Karen and with the help of friends and family, Karen finds love again.

results.title: No more funerals
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Michelle W
results.brief_description: Michelle is diagnosed with HIV in the early 80’s. She reflects on how treatments have improved over the years and celebrates the fact that she no longer attends as many funerals.
results.description: Michelle is diagnosed with HIV in the early 80’s. She reflects on how treatments have improved over the years and celebrates the fact that she no longer attends as many funerals.

results.title: Healing
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Judith Odgers
results.brief_description: Judith is teaching in Thailand as a young teacher. It is an extraordinary cultural experience and also life changing as Judith is diagnosed with HIV. This story delves into the psyche of a young woman coming to terms with the taboos and limitations of the virus she has contracted.
results.description: Judith is teaching in Thailand as a young teacher. It is an extraordinary cultural experience and also life changing as Judith is diagnosed with HIV. This story delves into the psyche of a young woman coming to terms with the taboos and limitations of the virus she has contracted.

This story delves into the psyche of a young woman coming to terms with the taboos and limitations of the virus she has contracted.

results.title: A Global family
results.brief_description: Suzanne reflects on the impacts of her HIV diagnosis and in particular coming to terms with the fact that her dream to have children would not be realised in the way that she first imagined.

results.title: The Gift
results.brief_description: Deanna is given a real gift in life, this gift is really challenging but as she begins to understand the nature of this gift she understands its true importance.
